mapper.update: /* 공지사항, 템플릿 수정 */ update notice set upper_seq = #{upperSeq}, lower_seq = #{lowerSeq}, title = #{title}, notice = #{notice}, template = #{template}, use_yn = #{useYn}, updated_at = now() where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: /* 게시글에 맞는 말머리 리스트 검색 */ select prepend, upperSeq from prepend where upperSeq = #{seq}
select seq, template, notice, lower_seq "lowerSeq", upper_seq "upperSeq", use_yn "useYn", created_at "createdAt", title from notice where seq = #{seq}
